page.title: 20TOURISM IN DENBIGH.
page.content: Denbigh is ideally located to serve as a centre for tourists visiting North Wales.Attractions such as the {Snowdonia National Park, Brenig {Reservoir, beaches and coastal {resorts}such as Rhyl, with its fun fair and new Sun Centre, are only a short car ride away. The town itself with its historical importance,scenic and commanding position within the {Vale {of Clwyd,}provides ample interest for the visitor. A variety of accomodation is available within the town, including {hotels, guest houses, camping and {caravan}sites.The most noteable of these is the fourteenth century Bull Hotel which is regularly visited by parties of Austrailian tourists.
